examples: There were lots of questions referring to her talk
My remark pertained to your earlier comments
I worry about the second Germanic consonant shift

results.definition: feeling or showing worry or solicitude
examples: we feel concerned about accomplishing the task at hand
greatly concerned not to disappoint a small child

results.definition: involved in or affected by or having a claim to or share in
examples: an enterprise in which three men are concerned
factors concerned in the rise and fall of epidemics
the interested parties met to discuss the business
all those concerned in the bribery case have been identified
named three officials implicated in the plot
an innocent person implicated by circumstances in a crime
